title: Salmon and sorrel with vermouth
description: This very English dish contrasts rich salmon and cream with bitter, citrussy sorrel and a pepped up green salad.
ingredients: 2 tbsp finely chopped fresh flatleaf parsley leaves
1 tbsp finely chopped fresh mint leaves
1 tbsp finely chopped fresh basil leaves
1 tbsp finely chopped fresh thyme leaves
salt and freshly ground black pepper
200g/7oz salmon fillet, cut lengthways into 8 thin slices
75g/2½oz fresh sorrel leaves, de-veined, very finely sliced
1 bag green salad leaves, to serve
